name: Wet A** Road
description:
You are Cardi B riding into the sunset after a storm. But oh no! There are so many wet a** pu**ies!! What do we do now??

Controls:

- Press the play button on the main screen then use the arrow keys to move! (Cant play the game twice lol so close the window to play it again!)

Diversifiers:

Walk the Dinosaur, The Roaring 20's, Speed run 

Made for #abgamejam2020!! YAY

Made by Nicole Chik, Alan Manuba, Samadhi Ranatunga and Harrold Paderan
